ResourceHeader.Description:
The Pas (TPAS) station is located in The Pas, MB, Canada. TPAS is part of the UCLA GBO Network.
+--------------------------------------------+ | Station Characteristics | Value | Units | |-------------------------|--------|---------| | Magnetic Latitude | 63.27 | degrees | | Magnetic Longitude | 323.80 | degrees | | Magnetic Declination | 7.30 | degrees | | UT of Magnetic Midnight | 07.05 | HH:MM | +--------------------------------------------+
Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007.
